text: matyani (nakaratti)lullavarkalukku, avarkalutaiya cakotararakiya su'aipai (nam tutaraka) anuppivaittom. Avar (avarkalitam; "en) camukattavarkale! Allah (oruvanaiye) ninkal vanankunkal. Avanaittavira unkalukku veru nayanillai; alavaiyilum niruvaiyilum ninkal kuraivu ceyyatirkal; ninkal nalla nilaiyaiyiliruppatai (ippolutu) nan kankinren; anal (alavilum, niruvaiyilum ninkal mocam ceytal) niccayamaka unkalaic culntu kollakkutiya vetanai oru nal unkalai vantataiyum enru nan payappatukiren
